title: Best of the Program | 6/27/22
description:
Pat and Stu go over the Left’s emotional stupidity in their responses to Roe and debunk all the myths surrounding abortion. More Supreme Court decisions are coming out, including a case affirming religious liberty. How can anybody fight against the birth of more children in minority areas? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
